sentences.sContent: We must send our most trusted officer to parley with their leaders for an exchange of prisoners.
sentences.sContent_eng: We must send our most trusted officer to parley with their leaders for an exchange of prisoners.
sentences.sCn: 为了交换俘虏我们必须派一名可靠的军官去与他们的领导人谈判。

sentences.sContent: Then be began to parley with me.
sentences.sContent_eng: Then be began to parley with me.

trans.tranOther: a discussion in which enemies try to achieve peace
